channel.title: How About Some Introductions
channel.description:
Just thought I'd start a topic for Introductions. Not that we all really need one. But I'll start off first.
Hello, My name is David but you guys can call me D1g1By3, or D1g1 for short...(Long story). I am just a regular Guy that enjoys gaming. (trying not to give out too much personal info). I was introduced to TOL ironically through TOS (Town f Salem). I will try not to mention them too much due to being the competition. Apologies if that was considered advertising... I'm Not advertising them just saying that's where I came from.........Anyways I am really looking forward to this game to become a reality. The whole Idea of having much more interaction in a 3D universe. (So unlike all of it's predecessors.) Is intriguing to me. What originally started as pretty much a Text based, use your imagination type Genre, has turned into something truly remarkable. I am having High hopes for this and hope to see it continue to grow, even after Development. Anyways, not really much of an Intro. It's turned into a "My hopes for what to come" I guess. But I look forward to seeing other peoples "Introductions" as well.
~ D1g1 signing out.

item.title: How About Some Introductions
item.dc:creator: D1g1Byt3
item.description:
Just thought I’d start a topic for Introductions. Not that we all really need one. But I’ll start off first.

Hello, My name is David but you guys can call me D1g1By3, or D1g1 for short…(Long story). I am just a regular Guy that enjoys gaming. (trying not to give out too much personal info). I was introduced to TOL ironically through TOS (Town f Salem). I will try not to mention them too much due to being the competition. Apologies if that was considered advertising… I’m Not advertising them just saying that’s where I came from…Anyways I am really looking forward to this game to become a reality. The whole Idea of having much more interaction in a 3D universe. (So unlike all of it’s predecessors.) Is intriguing to me. What originally started as pretty much a Text based, use your imagination type Genre, has turned into something truly remarkable. I am having High hopes for this and hope to see it continue to grow, even after Development. Anyways, not really much of an Intro. It’s turned into a “My hopes for what to come” I guess. But I look forward to seeing other peoples “Introductions” as well.

~ D1g1 signing out.
